thread.title: Listen to Stormzy’s Version of Kanye’s “Ultralight Beam”
thread.title_full: Listen to Stormzy’s Version of Kanye’s “Ultralight Beam”

author: Jazz Monroe
title: Listen to Stormzy’s Version of Kanye’s “Ultralight Beam”
text:
Open share drawer Listen to Stormzy’s Version of Kanye’s “Ultralight Beam” The grime MC adds his own verses to the Life of Pablo track in live session Stormzy (Photo by Joseph Okpako/WireImage); Kanye (Photo by: Dana Edelson/NBC/NBCU Photo Bank via Getty Images) 
Stormzy has performed a version of Kanye West ’s The Life of Pablo opener “Ultralight Beam” in session with BBC Radio 1’s Clara Amfo, as the Fader points out . Backed by gospel singers and a live band, Stormzy added his own verses to the track, concluding, “This is what it sounds like when south London meets salvation.” Listen here at 2:14:30 . Introducing the cover, he said, “I love the message of the song. I love the musicality of the song. It’s one of my favorite songs.” 
Watch the video for “ Big for Your Boots ”: Artists In This Story
